name: result
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool sports_betting_api.
Tool description: Get up and running in less than 5 minutes with our comprehensive developer documentation. Get Start - https://bet365soft.com/docs
API description: This function retrieves the result of a sports event using the specified language and event ID, by querying the Sports Betting API.

lang.description: Language code for the results (e.g., 'en' for English).

evt.description: Event ID for which the result is to be fetched.
